Document.Focus: Dementia - what to ask your doctor

Synonyms.Synonym: What to ask your doctor about dementia
Alzheimer disease- what to ask your doctor
Cognitive impairment - what to ask your doctor

QAPair.Question: What is (are) Dementia - what to ask your doctor ?
QAPair.Answer: You are caring for someone who has dementia . Below are questions you may want to ask their health care provider to help you take care of that person.
